destination.name: Paris
destination.description: The capital city of France, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

destination.name: Tokyo
destination.description: The bustling capital of Japan, famous for its modern skyscrapers and traditional temples.

destination.name: New York
destination.description: Known as the Big Apple, it's famous for its skyline, Broadway shows, and diverse culture.

destination.name: Sydney
destination.description: Famous for its Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge, it's a vibrant city by the sea.
